qemu_args:
-drive file=hdd/win98.qcow2,id=disk0,if=scsi,format=qcow2 \
-device scsi-hd,drive=disk0 \
-drive file=extras/disk.img,id=disk1,if=scsi,format=raw \
-device scsi-hd,drive=disk1 \
-drive file=cdrom/win98qi_v0.9.6_ALL.iso,id=disk2,if=none \
-device ide-cd,drive=disk2 \
-drive file=cdrom/softgpu-0.6.2024.40.iso,id=disk3,if=none \
-device ide-cd,drive=disk3 \
-drive file=cdrom/wrappers.iso,id=disk4,if=none \
-device ide-cd,drive=disk4 \
-drive file=cdrom/mesa9x-24.1.5.114-driver-win98.iso,id=disk5,if=none \
-device ide-cd,drive=disk5 \
-drive file=cdrom/Security9_enu_15.iso,id=disk6,if=none \
-device ide-cd,drive=disk6 \
-drive file=cdrom/vmaddons.iso,id=disk7,if=none \
-device ide-cd,drive=disk7 \
-drive file=floppy/disks/abd4/fd4.ima,id=floppy0,if=floppy,unit=0,format=raw
